bug.author: gpang
bug.summary: Block locations are incorrect when using ROCKS
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.3.0 Describe the bug Block locations are incorrect when using ROCKS store. Even when a particular block is not loaded into Alluxio storage, that block has various block locations and duplicate locations. To Reproduce Set alluxio.master.metastore=ROCKS <denchmark-code>./bin/alluxio fs copyFromLocal LICENSE /a ./bin/alluxio fs copyFromLocal LICENSE /b ./bin/alluxio fs free /
# load only b ./bin/alluxio fs load /b
./bin/alluxio fs stat /a ./bin/alluxio fs stat /b </denchmark-code>
Expected behavior Only /b should have block locations, but both files will have block locations. Urgency Critical. Additional context This probably affects earlier versions.
